text:
Ehehe...
I was just thinking, I wish it would snow~

I see.
The forecast did mention some areas might get snow...

Hehe, the feeling of snow
somehow makes me excited.

Yeah, yeah, wondering if it will accumulate~
or just gazing absentmindedly at the white sky...

...Building a snowman,
having a snowball fight.

Making a snow hut...
and a snow rabbit.
